name: Node.js App (Generic)
description: Generic Node.js template for websites, bots, or services
author: Aero Maintainers

variables.name: GIT_REPO
variables.description: Git clone URL for the repository

variables.name: GIT_BRANCH
variables.description: Git branch or tag to deploy

variables.name: BUILD_COMMAND
variables.description: Optional build command (leave blank to skip)

installScript:
#!/bin/sh
set -e

echo '[Aero] Starting Node.js app installation...'

mkdir -p {{SERVER_DIR}}
cd {{SERVER_DIR}}

if [ -z "{{GIT_REPO}}" ]; then
  echo '[Aero] ERROR: GIT_REPO is required'
  exit 1
fi

if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  if [ -d app ]; then
    echo '[Aero] Updating existing repo...'
    cd app
    git fetch --all --prune
    git checkout {{GIT_BRANCH}}
    git reset --hard origin/{{GIT_BRANCH}}
  else
    echo '[Aero] Cloning repository...'
    git clone --depth 1 --branch {{GIT_BRANCH}} {{GIT_REPO}} app
    cd app
  fi
else
  echo '[Aero] ERROR: git is required but not installed in the image'
  exit 1
fi

# Create .env file with repo link and runtime config
cat > .env << 'ENVVARS'
GIT_REPO={{GIT_REPO}}
NODE_ENV={{NODE_ENV}}
PORT={{PORT}}
ENVVARS

# Install dependencies
if [ -n "{{INSTALL_COMMAND}}" ]; then
  echo '[Aero] Installing dependencies...'
  sh -c "{{INSTALL_COMMAND}}"
fi

# Build step (optional)
if [ -n "{{BUILD_COMMAND}}" ]; then
  echo '[Aero] Building application...'
  sh -c "{{BUILD_COMMAND}}"
fi

echo '[Aero] Installation complete!'
